name: Fraser Brown
content: Fraser Brown Fraser Brown I'm a faculty member at CMU, where I work on program correctness for security. I did my PhD at Stanford with Dawson Engler (and often collaborating with Deian Stefan at UCSD). I graduated from Stanford in 2016 with a BA in English Literature, advised by Elaine Treharne.
